Package model.cards.PlayableCards

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
model.cards.PlayableCards.PlayableCard
model.cards.PlayableCards.GoldCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Card
public class GoldCard extends PlayableCard
Represents a GoldCard, which is a type of PlayableCard with specific properties such as blocked elements and placement constraints.
See Also:
